Interrupts.Name: Counter Strike
Interrupts.Description: An ally in range 3 gains resistance against an incoming attack. The monk may then teleport adjacent to that ally.

Actions.Name: Fist of Punishment
Actions.Effect: Becomes a critical hit against pacified foes.

Actions.Name: Seal of Judgement
Actions.Description: A foe in range 4 is branded. If already branded, they must save or become pacified.
